fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Navy Blue symbolizes trust, stability, and authority. Navy Blue can visit a player, appearing as an authority of that player's faction to the target. Navy Blue will then learn who the target plans on targeting, and will see all whispers sent by their target the next day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - When targeting a Neutral or the head of any evil faction, Navy Blue's ability will not fail, but the target will learn that they trusted someone who may not be on their side, if the target is a Neutral. If the target is a factional head, they will learn they trusted someone who may be impersonating them.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Paint the Town into a rainbow!
